attributes.action: Legally require all road signs in Britain to be converted to metric units like the Irish PM did
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Irish people did so as follows: they're replaced depleted imperial-marked road signs with new metric-marked (metric only!) road signs. No cost. We should replace our road signs too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
